footer.title: PUBLOX
footer.description:
PUBLOX helps local businesses attract more customers
through advertising,
automation and digital
systems
focused on real
results.

hero.subtitle:
We help local businesses grow with a clear strategy of
acquisition, visibility and automation.

captacion.title: Customer Acquisition
captacion.text1: Attract more customers with digital marketing strategies focused on real results.
captacion.text2: We develop personalized campaigns that connect your business with your target audience.
captacion.text3: Continuous measurement and optimization to maximize return on investment.

automatizacion.title: Automation
automatizacion.text1: Simplify your processes with automated systems that work 24/7.
automatizacion.text2: From automatic responses to customer management, we optimize your daily operations.
automatizacion.text3: More time for what really matters: growing your business.

redesSociales.title: Social Media
redesSociales.text1: Professional presence on major social platforms.
redesSociales.text2: Strategic content that generates engagement and builds a loyal community.
redesSociales.text3: Comprehensive management of your digital brand with measurable results.

sitioWeb.title: Website
sitioWeb.text1: Professional web design adapted to your local business.
sitioWeb.text2: Fast, optimized sites designed to convert visitors into customers.
sitioWeb.text3: From corporate sites to complete online stores.

impresion.title: Professional Printing
impresion.text1: High-quality graphic materials for your business.
impresion.text2: Business cards, flyers, brochures and more, designed to make an impact.
impresion.text3: Professional printing that reflects the quality of your brand.

oportunidad.title: A real opportunity
oportunidad.subtitle: COLLABORATE WITH A SOLUTION THAT ALREADY WORKS FOR LOCAL BUSINESSES.

card.title: Earn up to 20% commission
card.text1: Join our affiliate program and help local businesses grow while generating recurring income.
card.text2: Each business you refer that becomes a client generates a commission based on real results.
card.text3: No limits, no restrictions. The more businesses you help, the more you earn.

vignette1.title: No technical knowledge required
vignette1.text: You don't need to be an expert in marketing or technology. You just need to connect businesses with PUBLOX.

vignette2.title: Your mission is to connect
vignette2.text: Your mission is to connect businesses with PUBLOX. We do the rest.

vignette3.title: Commission system
vignette3.text: Commission system based on results and long-term collaboration.

affiliates.title: Our trusted affiliates and partners
affiliates.subtitle: Companies and brands collaborating with us within our professional ecosystem.

mainCard.title: Group & Holding
mainCard.text1: PUBLOX is part of a business group focused on digital development, marketing, and automation for local businesses.
mainCard.text2: This ecosystem allows us to deliver solid, scalable solutions driven by real results.

hero.title: What do you need to grow your business?

marketing.title: Marketing & Customer Acquisition
marketing.intro: We implement complete customer acquisition strategies, adapted to local businesses:
marketing.list1: Advertising on Google Ads and Google Maps
marketing.list6: Customized strategy based on your sector and city
marketing.conclusion: Our goal is simple: more visibility, more contacts and more sales.

sitioWeb.title: Website
sitioWeb.intro: We create all types of websites, adapted to your objectives:
sitioWeb.list6: Integration with WhatsApp, payments and automations
sitioWeb.conclusion: Each site is designed to convert visitors into customers, fast, modern and optimized for mobile.

impresion.title: Professional printing for your local business
impresion.intro: We design and produce all the physical materials your business needs to attract and convert customers:
impresion.list5: Menus, gift cards and printed supports
impresion.list6: Design + printing + delivery ready to use
impresion.conclusion: Each support is designed to reinforce your image, generate trust and bring customers to your WhatsApp or Google Maps.

hero.title: Marketing & Customer Acquisition
hero.subtitle1: Boost the growth of your local business with a clear and profitable strategy.
hero.subtitle2: Marketing, visibility and automation designed to generate real customers.

pack1.title: Acquisition Pack
pack1.description: We create a customer acquisition system designed so your business appears on Google, generates real contacts and is understandable for both customers and Google.

faq.q1: How long does it take to see results?
faq.a1: It depends on the sector and competition, but normally signs are seen in 7–14 days and more stable results in 3–6 weeks.
faq.q2: Do I need to invest in advertising?
faq.a2: Yes, if we activate campaigns. The investment is separate and adjusted according to city and objectives.
faq.q3: What do I need to provide to get started?
faq.a3: Business information, location, services and a contact channel (WhatsApp/phone).
faq.q4: What if I already have a Google Business Profile?
faq.a4: We audit and optimize it to improve visibility and conversions.

pack2.title: Branding + Acquisition Pack
pack2.description: This pack includes everything in the Customer Acquisition pack, plus complete branding and visual presence work to reinforce trust and business image.

faq.q1: Does it include logo and visual design?
faq.a1: It includes visual improvement and coherence. A complete new logo is defined separately if necessary.
faq.q2: How does branding improve my results?
faq.a2: It increases trust and improves the conversion of visits into contacts.
faq.q3: Can I keep my current style?
faq.a3: Yes. It is professionalized without losing identity.
faq.a4: Basic visual guide and application of branding in the channels worked on.

pack3.title: Automation + Acquisition + Branding Pack
pack3.description1: This pack includes everything in the Customer Acquisition and Branding packs, plus the implementation of automation systems to convert contacts into customers without wasting time.
pack3.description2: It is designed for local businesses that want a system that works smoothly, even when they are not available.

faq.a1: Automatic messages, follow-up, forms, lead classification and contact flows.
faq.a2: Sometimes yes. It is always validated beforehand and the simplest option is sought.
faq.q3: Does it work even if I don't respond quickly?
faq.a3: Yes. The system captures and responds automatically so as not to lose opportunities.
faq.q4: Can it be scaled to multiple services or cities?
faq.a4: Yes. The system is designed to grow.

items.q1: What type of businesses does PUBLOX work for?
items.a1: Local service businesses, tourism, health, beauty, restaurants and more.
items.q2: Do you work with long contracts?
items.a2: It's not mandatory. Continuity is recommended for better results.
items.a3: We don't promise false numbers. We work with real measurable results.
items.q4: What differentiates PUBLOX from a normal agency?
items.q5: What is the minimum advertising budget?
items.a5: It depends on the sector and city. It is defined strategically.
items.q6: Can I keep my current website?
items.a6: Yes. Existing is optimized if viable.
items.a7: Leads, messages, calls, reservations and monthly evolution.
items.q8: What do I need to get started?
items.a8: Basic business information and access to necessary channels.
items.q9: Do you only work in Spain?
items.a9: No. The system adapts by city and country.
items.a10: Yes. Packs are designed to evolve.

marketingAdquisicion.intro: We implement complete customer acquisition strategies, adapted to local businesses:
bullets: Local Google Ads campaign setup (real searches, purchase intent)
Basic and local SEO optimization (structure, content, Google visibility)
Google Business Profile setup and online presence coherence
Redirect to WhatsApp, forms or landing page
QR code implementation to capture offline customers
Customized strategy based on your sector and city
marketingAdquisicion.note: Launch service. No mandatory monthly management.

marketingBrandingAdquisicion.intro1: Complete customer acquisition system (Google Ads, basic local SEO, Google Business Profile, WhatsApp, QR, acquisition structure)
bullets: Google Maps visual optimization (image, coherence, presentation)
Production of 3–4 Reels videos focused on image and credibility
marketingBrandingAdquisicion.note: Launch service. No mandatory monthly management.

marketingAutomatizacion.intro1: Complete Customer Acquisition pack (Google Ads, basic local SEO, Google Business Profile, WhatsApp, QR, acquisition structure)
marketingAutomatizacion.intro2: Complete Branding and Visibility pack (visual identity, Google Maps, content, 3–4 Reels videos, local reputation)
bullets: Automatic responses based on customer action
Customer follow-up structure to not lose opportunities
marketingAutomatizacion.note: Launch service. No mandatory monthly management.

corporativo.title: Corporate Website
corporativo.description: Ideal for presenting your business clearly, professionally and credibly.

faq.q1: What type of business is a corporate website ideal for?
faq.a1: It is ideal for local businesses and companies that want to present their services clearly, professionally and generate trust.
faq.q2: Does the website include a mobile version?
faq.a2: Yes. It is optimized for mobile, tablet and computer.
faq.q3: Can I show my services and contact?
faq.a3: Yes. The site is designed to explain services and facilitate contact via WhatsApp or form.
faq.q4: Is the site optimized for Google?
faq.a4: Yes. It includes a basic and local SEO structure.

tiendaOnline.title: Online Store
tiendaOnline.description: To sell products or services directly from your website.

faq.q1: Can I sell products and services from the web?
faq.a1: Yes. The store allows selling physical products, digital products or services.
faq.a2: Yes. Secure online payments can be integrated according to the chosen solution.
faq.q3: Can I manage products and orders easily?
faq.a3: Yes. Management is designed to be simple and intuitive.
faq.a4: Yes. You can start small and expand when your business grows.

items.q1: How long does it take for the website to be ready?
items.a1: It depends on the type of site, but we aim for a fast and functional delivery.
items.q2: Do I need to have texts and images prepared?
items.a2: No. It can be structured first and content added later.
items.q4: Can I connect the site with WhatsApp?
items.a4: Yes. The site can redirect directly to WhatsApp.
items.q5: Can I use the site for advertising?
items.a5: Yes. It is an ideal base for Google Ads and social networks.
items.q6: Is the site fast and modern?
items.a6: Yes. It is optimized for speed and user experience.
items.q7: Can I modify the content later?
items.a7: Yes. The site is designed to evolve.
items.q8: Does it include mandatory monthly maintenance?
items.a8: No. The service is a launch service.
items.q9: Does the site help generate customers?
items.a9: Yes. It is designed to convert visits into contacts.
items.q10: Can I start simple and expand later?
items.a10: Yes. The site is a scalable base.

bullets: Reinforcement of reputation and local presence
sitioWebCorporativo.note: Perfect for businesses that want to exist and be found online.

sitioWebTiendaOnline.note: Perfect for businesses that want to exist and be found online.

block1.title: Professional Business Cards (Double Sided)
block1.conclusion: Ideal for quick contacts and first impression.

faq.q1: What information can I include on the cards?
faq.a1: Name, contact, services, logo and optionally QR for WhatsApp, Google Maps or web.
faq.a2: Yes. Custom design included according to your visual identity.
faq.a3: High quality paper with finish options according to needs.
faq.a4: Depends on quantity and finishes, normally 5-10 business days.

block2.title: Promotional Flyers (Double Sided) A5
block2.conclusion: Perfect for local promotions and physical distribution.

faq.a1: Standard A5 format, double sided for maximum impact.
faq.a2: Yes. QR can be integrated for WhatsApp, Google Maps or landing page.
faq.a3: Yes. Professional graphic design included with call to action.
faq.q4: What type of promotions is it ideal for?
faq.a4: Ideal for offers, events, launches and local promotions.

block3.title: Brochures / Tri-fold Brochures A5
bullets: Ideal for explaining an offer or activity
block3.conclusion: Ideal for presenting your business in a structured way.

faq.q1: What's the difference between brochure and tri-fold?
faq.a1: Brochure has 2 folds, tri-fold has 3. Both allow structured information presentation.
faq.a2: Services, offers, business information, contact and more, organized clearly.
faq.a3: Yes. Professional and readable design included.
faq.q4: What businesses is it ideal for?
faq.a4: Ideal for businesses that need to explain services or offers in detail.

block4.title: Display Stand (Double Sided)
bullets: Perfect for promotions, QR or direct messages
block4.conclusion: Very visible at customer contact points.

faq.q1: What size is the display stand?
faq.a1: Standard display stand size, double sided for maximum visibility.
faq.a2: Yes. Perfect for including QR that direct to WhatsApp, Google Maps or web.
faq.a3: At contact points: reception, counters, events, commercial premises.
faq.a4: Yes. Professional double sided design included.

items.a1: Depends on product and quantity. Normally between 5-15 business days from design validation.
items.a2: A5 for flyers and brochures, standard formats for cards and display stands. Other formats on request.
items.q3: What paper quality and finishes do you offer?
items.a3: High quality paper with finish options according to product. Defined according to needs.
items.q4: Can I include QR codes on all products?
items.a4: Yes. QR codes can be integrated on cards, flyers and display stands to direct to WhatsApp, Google Maps or web.
items.a5: Yes. Professional design included for all products, adapted to your visual identity.
items.a6: Depends on product. Defined according to needs and budget.
items.q7: How do I send my logo and content?
items.a7: Can be sent by email or shared access. Preferred formats: logo in vector or high resolution.
items.a8: Yes. Always a proof is sent for validation before final printing.
items.a9: Delivery or pickup according to location. Coordinated once design is validated.
items.q10: Can I make changes or reprint?
items.a10: Yes. Changes before final printing. Reprints on request according to needs.

impresionTarjetas.conclusion: Perfect for quick contacts and first impression.

impresionFlyers.conclusion: Perfect for local promotions and physical distribution.

impresionDipticos.conclusion: Ideal for presenting your business in a structured way.

hero.title: A real opportunity
hero.subtitle: Collaborate with a solution that already works for local businesses.

mainSection.title: Earn up to 20% commission
mainSection.paragraph1: As a PUBLOX collaborator, you receive a commission for each local business that joins thanks to you.
mainSection.paragraph2: Your role is simple: identify businesses that need more customers and connect them with our team.
mainSection.paragraph3: PUBLOX handles everything: strategy, advertising, automation, follow-up and customer support.
mainSection.paragraph4: The commission can reach up to 20%, depending on the type of collaboration and the duration of the client.
mainSection.paragraph5: There are no fixed limits or false promises: everything is based on real results and long-term relationships. No initial investment. No mandatory goals. No risk.

card2.caption: Your mission is to connect businesses with PUBLOX. We do the rest.

card3.caption: Commission system based on results and long-term collaboration.

contacto.title: Contact
contacto.subtitle: Choose your contact method and we'll respond as soon as possible.
